attributes.action: Relocate Parent & Child spaces away from store entrances to reduce misuse
attributes.background: The parent & child space initiative is widely implemented in many supermarkets, shopping centres and retail parks. The spaces are located close to the store, which leads to non parents using the wider parent & child spaces, then parents with children struggling in standard spaces.

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual retailers and car park operators, not the Government or Parliament.
